subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: A swollen hip at the 2012 Adidas Grand Prix caused Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee, to miss by under a second qualifying for the 2012 London Olympics in the 400 meters.
snippet: A swollen hip at the 2012 Adidas Grand Prix caused Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee, to miss by under a second qualifying for the 2012 London Olympics in the 400 meters.
